title: Strip and Repaint an Aircraft
description: An aircraft is being rebranded with a new livery. An MRO facility must strip the old paint and apply the new one.

tasks.description: Apply chemical stripper to the aircraft to remove the old paint.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent safely manages the paint stripping process.

tasks.description: Inspect the bare metal skin for any corrosion or damage that was hidden by the old paint.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs an inspection and finds no hidden damage.

tasks.description: Apply the new livery according to the customer's engineering drawings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully paints the aircraft in the new colors and logos.
